description: Create a new security group rule
name: security.group.rule.create

dst_port.description: Destination port, may be a range: 137:139 (default: 0; only required for proto tcp and udp)

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

group.description: Create rule in this security group (name or ID)

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

proto.description: IP protocol (icmp, tcp, udp; default: tcp)

src_ip.description: Source IP address block (may use CIDR notation; default: 0.0.0.0/0)
